name: Witches & Vampires: The Secrets of Ashburry
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Centuries ago, witches and vampires came together united against the feared and powerful vampire Gorazul. Working together as a team they defeated Gorazul, creating 6 amulets to safely contain this power for all eternity.

Many centuries have now passed, and with his loyal minions rallied behind him, the evil dark vampire Abaddon is on a quest for the power of Gorazul and will stop at nothing to reunite the amulets and harness their power.

Play as Aluna, Ruby and Dariel, witch and vampire siblings, whose unique powers will be needed in their quest for the amulets and to defeat the evil of Abaddon. Using your stylus create witches brew, cast powerful magic spells, and fly around town, as you are now the last hope for Ashburry and of the world.
